Spells-Divine -- Male Half-Elf Cleric: 12
Strength: 18 (+4) Dexterity: 16 (+3) Constitution: 14 (+2) Intelligence: 14 (+2) Wisdom: 16 (+3) Charisma: 16 (+3)
Background: Acrobat Alignment: Neutral Deity: Nethys (N)
Experience: 11352/12000 Level: 12 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 11/16
Ability Notes:
Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 12 from any)
Hefty Hauler: +2 Encumbered Bulk/+2 Maximum Bulk
Cat Fall: Suffers 10' less damage from falling
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 3; Class: 6; General: 3; Skill: 6 Selectable Feature Count: Cleric (Divine Font); Cleric (Doctrine); Human (Heritage)
Feats: Additional Lore (Milling Lore); Assurance (Arcana); Cantrip Expansion; Cat Fall; Clever Improviser; Divine Weapon; Experienced Professional; Hefty Hauler; Natural Skill; Reach Spell; Replenishment Of War; Sap Life; Skill Training (Athletics); Skill Training (Midwifery Lore); Steady Spellcasting; Titan Wrestler; Unconventional Weaponry (Halberd); Weapon Proficiency (Sawtooth Saber) Cleric Features: Ability Boost (Wisdom); Ability Boosts; Alertness; Attack Trained (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Cleric Feats; Cleric Skills; Defense Trained (Unarmored Defense); Deity; Divine Font; Divine Spellcasting; Doctrine; General Feats; Harmful Font; Lightning Reflexes; Perception Trained; Resolve; Save Expert (Will); Save Trained (Fortitude; Reflex); Skill Feats; Skill Increases; Spell Trained (Divine); Warpriest Acrobat Features: Ability Boost (Choose 1 from Dexterity, Strength; Choose 1 from any); Skill Trained (Acrobatics; Circus Lore); Steady Balance Human Features: Ability Boost (Choose 2 from any); Ancestry Feats; Half-Elf; Human Heritage
Feature Notes:

Cleric Feats: 6 selections

Deity: Has the Anathema feature
Divine Font: 1 selection
Doctrine: 1 selection
General Feats: 3 selections
Half-Elf: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Skill Feats: 6 selections
Warpriest: Has the Deadly Simplicity feature
Warpriest: Has the Shield Block feature
Anathema: May not perform acts or cast spells prohibited by Nethys
Half-Elf: Has the elf trait and may take elf and half-elf feats
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +19 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:

Untrained Improvisation: +12 on untrained skill checks
Assurance (Arcana): Can take an automatic 26 on Arcana checks
Clever Improviser: May attempt any skill untrained
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the income
Steady Balance: Balance successes are critical successes/Never flat-footed during Balance/Can use Acrobatics to Grab an Edge
Titan Wrestler: Can use Disarm, Grapple, Shove, and Trip on creatures up to 2 sizes larger
Combat
Hit Points: 128 Armor Class: 27 (dexterity (5 max); trained)
Armor: Explorer's Clothing Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Battle Axe (+18 1d8+4 S; strength; trained); Morningstar (+20 1d6+4 B/P; strength; expert); Sap (+18 1d6+4 B; strength; trained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +24
Deadly Simplicity: Staff inflicts +1 damage die step
Deity: Attack Trained (Staff)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Unconventional Weaponry (Halberd): Weapon Familiarity (Halberd)
Warpriest: Defense Trained (Light Armor; Medium Armor)/Attack Trained (Martial Weapons)/Attack Expert (Staff; Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Weapon Proficiency (Sawtooth Saber): Attack Trained (Sawtooth Saber)
Replenishment Of War: Successful Strikes with a staff give self 6 temporary Hit Points, or 12 temporary Hit Points on a critical hit, until the start of the next turn
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Warpriest: Critical hits with a staff inflict its critical specialization effect
Save: Fortitude: +18 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +19 (dexterity; expert); Will: +21 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Resolve: Save Master (Will)
Warpriest: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Magic
Spell Slots: D1: 3; D2: 3; D3: 3; D4: 3; D5: 3; D6: 3; DC1: 5 Attack: Divine: +19 (wisdom; expert) Spell DC: Divine: 29 (wisdom; expert)
Spells:
Abyssal Plague (D5 Nec): (2) Touched suffers stage 1 Abyssal plague, which inflicts unrecoverable drained 1 until cured; subsequent failures after 1 day will inflict drained 2 at stage 2 (save Fortitude inflicts 2 HP evil per spell level and -2 saves vs. Abyssal plague for 1 day; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stage 2)
Agile Feet (D1 Foc Tra): (1) Self gains +5' Speed and can move normally in difficult terrain for the remainder of the turn
Air Bubble (D1 Con): (R) R60' Allows target to breathe normally in any environment for 1 min
Air Walk (D4 Tra): (2) Touched can walk up to a 45-degree angle on air for 5 min
Alarm (D1 Abj): (10 min) 20' burst triggers a mental or audible alarm when a Small or larger corporeal creature enters without saying a specified password for 8 hr (heightened 3rd allows specifying characteristics of triggering creatures)
Anathematic Reprisal (D4 Enc): (R) R30' Target who committed the triggering anathema act suffers 4d6 HP mental and stupefied 1 for 1 rd (save basic Will; success negates stupefied) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Antimagic Field (D8 Abj): (3) 10' emanation disables spells and magic items while sustained for up to 1 min
Appearance Of Wealth (D1 Foc Ill): (2) R30' 5' burst fascinates creatures attracted to wealth in a 20' radius while sustained for up to 1 min (save Will effects last for 1 action; critical success negates)
Artistic Flourish (D4 Foc Tra): (2) R15' Target weapon or skill tool becomes impressive and gains +1 attack or checks for 10 min (heightened 7th gives +2 bonus; 10th gives +2 bonus)
Athletic Rush (D1 Foc Tra): (1) Self gains +10' Speed and +2 Athletics for 1 rd and may immediately Stride, Leap, Climb, or Swim
Augury (D2 Div): (10 min) Reveals whether the results of a proposed action up to 30 min in the future will be generally good or bad
Avatar (D10 Tra): (2) Self becomes a Huge creature with darkvision, 30 temporary HP, Armor Class 37, +33 attack, +35 Athletics, and deity-specific features for 1 min
Bane (D1 Enc): (2) 5' emanation inflicts -1 attack on foes for 1 min (save Will negates); a concentrate action each rd increases the radius by 5'
Banishment (D5 Abj): (2) R30' Returns the target to its home plane (save Will (-2 if cast using an additional action and a target anathema) negates; critical success inflicts stunned 1 on self; critical failure prevents the target's return for 1 week) (heightened 9th affects 10 targets)
Bind Soul (D9 Nec): (2) R30' Traps the soul of a corpse dead for less than 1 min in a gem until counteracted or the gem is destroyed
Bind Undead (D3 Nec): (2) R30' Controls the actions of a mindless undead of level less than or equal to the spell level for 1 day
Bit Of Luck (D1 Foc Div): (2) R30' Willing target may use the better of two rolls on a save within 1 min once per target per day
Blade Barrier (D6 Evo): (3) R120' 20'x120'x2" wall inflicts 7d8 HP force for 1 min (save basic Reflex; critical failure prevents passage) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Bless (D1 Enc): (2) 5' radius gives allies +1 attack for 1 min; a concentrate action each rd increases the radius by 5'
Blind Ambition (D1 Foc Enc): (2) R60' Target suffers -2 to resist attempts to Coerce it to advance its ambitions for 10 min (save Will inflicts -1 resistance; critical success negates; critical failure causes single-minded focus on its ambitions)
Blindness (D3 Nec): (2) R30' Blinds the target for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last until next turn; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent blindness)
Breath Of Life (D5 Nec): (R) R60' Prevents the triggering target's death, restoring 4d8+3 HP
Calm Emotions (D2 Enc): (2) R120' 10' burst calms creatures and prevents them from taking hostile actions while sustained for up to 1 min; a hostile action ends the spell for the target (save Will inflicts -1 attack; critical success negates; critical failure allows the effects to continue after a hostile action)
Captivating Adoration (D4 Foc Enc): (2) Fascinates targets in a 15' emanation for 1 min (save Will effects last for 1 action; critical success negates; critical failure also improves attitude by 1 step) (heightened +1 increases the radius by 15')
Champion's Sacrifice (D6 Foc Abj): (R) R30' Redirects the damage of the triggering Strike or failed save from an ally to self
Charming Touch (D1 Foc Enc): (1) Touched becomes friendly, or helpful if already friendly, and cannot use hostile actions for 10 min (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure makes the target helpful)
Chill Touch (DC1 Nec): (2) Touch inflicts 1d4+3 HP negative on a living creature (save basic Fortitude; critical failure also inflicts enfeebled 1 for 1 rd) or flat-footed on an undead for 1 rd (save Fortitude negates; critical failure also inflicts fleeing for 1 rd) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP on living)
Chilling Darkness (D3 Evo): (2) R120' Spell attack inflicts 5d6 HP cold, plus 5d6 HP evil on celestials, (double HP on a critical success) and makes a counteract attempt vs. magical light (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP cold and evil)
Circle Of Protection (D3 Abj): (3) 10' emanation around touched gives +1 Armor Class and saves vs. creatures of a specified alignment, and +3 vs. summoned creatures and on effects that control touched, for 1 min (heightened 4th effects last for 1 hr)
Cloak Of Shadow (D1 Foc Evo): (1) 20' emanation around willing touched reduces bright light to dim and conceals touched for 1 min; target may shed the cloak, and the spell ends if another picks it up
Command (D1 Enc): (2) R30' Target obeys a command to approach, run away, drop a held object, drop prone, or stand in place for 1 action (save Will negates; critical failure causes the target to use all actions on its next turn to obey) (heightened 5th affects 10 targets)
Commanding Lash (D4 Foc Enc): (1) R100' Target harmed by self's most recent action obeys a command to approach, run away, drop a held object, drop prone, or stand in place for 1 rd (save Will negates; critical failure target uses all actions on its next turn to obey)
Competitive Edge (D4 Foc Enc): (1) Self gains +1 attack and skill checks, increasing to +3 immediately after a foe within 20' critically succeeds on the same, while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 7th increases bonuses to +2 and +4)
Comprehend Language (D2 Div): (2) R30' Target understands a chosen heard language for 1 hr (heightened 3rd the target can also speak the language; 4th affects 10 targets)
Continual Flame (D2 Evo): (3) Touched object emits a heatless flame until dismissed
Create Food (D2 Con): (1 hr) R30' Creates food for 6 Medium creatures that lasts for 1 day (heightened 4th creates food for 12; 6th creates food for 50; 8th creates food for 200)
Create Water (D1 Con): (2) Creates 2 gallons of water that last for 1 day
Crisis Of Faith (D3 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts 6d6 HP mental, or 6d8 HP mental and stupefied 1 for 1 rd on divine casters (save Will inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP, stupefied 1 for 1 rd, and no divine casting for 1 rd) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP, or +2d8 HP on divine casters)
Crusade (D9 Enc): (2) R60' 4 targets dedicate their actions to a specified cause for 10 min; the spell ends if an ally attacks a target or for a level 14+ target reduced to half HP (save Will for level 15+ each rd ends the spell) (heightened 10th the spell ends only for a level 16+ target reduced to half HP or a level 17+ target who saves)
Cry Of Destruction (D1 Foc Evo): (2) 15' cone inflicts 1d8 HP sonic, or 1d12 HP sonic if self has already damaged a foe this turn (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP or +1d12 HP)
Darkened Eyes (D4 Foc Tra): (2) R60' Suppresses the target's darkvision or low-light vision for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure also blinds until a successful save at the end of a turn)
Darkness (D2 Evo): (3) R120' 20' burst suppresses natural light and magical light of equal or lesser level for 1 min (heightened 4th conceals targets within the darkness from creatures with darkvision)
Darkvision (D2 Div): (2) Allows self to see in darkness for 1 hr (heightened 3rd affects a touched target; 5th effects last until next daily prep)
Daze (DC1 Enc): (2) R60' Inflicts 3 HP mental (save basic Will; critical failure also inflicts stunned 1) (heightened +2 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Dazzling Flash (D1 Foc Evo): (2) 15' cone inflicts blinded for 1 rd (Interact action ends the effect) and dazzled for 1 min (save Fortitude inflicts dazzled only for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure extends dazzled to 1 hr) (heightened 3rd extends effects to a 30' cone)
Deafness (D2 Nec): (2) R30' Inflicts deafness for 10 min (save Fortitude effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent deafness)
Death Knell (D2 Nec): (2) Kills a touched target with 0 HP and gives self 10 temporary HP and +1 attack and damage for 10 min (save Will increases the target's dying value by 1; critical success negates)
Death Ward (D5 Abj): (2) Touched gains +4 saves vs. death and negative effects, negative resistance 10, and suppressed doomed effects for 10 min
Death's Call (D1 Foc Nec): (R) R20' Gives self temporary HP for 1 min equal to 3 + the level of a living creature that dies, or double that for an undead creature that is destroyed
Delusional Pride (D4 Foc Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts -1 attacks and skill checks on a target that fails an attack or skill check by the end of its turn, or -2 if it fails twice, for 10 min (save Will effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure effects last for 24 hr)
Destructive Aura (D4 Foc Evo): (2) 15' emanation inflicts -2 resistances (heightened +2 inflicts an additional -2 resistances)
Detect Alignment (D1 Div): (2) 30' emanation reveals auras of a specified alignment (heightened 2nd reveals each aura's location and strength)
Detect Magic (DC1 Div): (2) 30' emanation reveals the presence of magic and lower-level illusions (heightened 3rd reveals the school of the highest-level effect; 4th reveals the approximate location of the highest-level effect)
Detect Poison (D1 Div): (2) R30' Reveals whether the target creature or object is venomous or poisoned (heightened 2nd reveals the number and types of poison)
Dimensional Anchor (D4 Abj): (2) R30' Attempts to counteract any effect that would move the target to a different plane for 10 min (save Will effects last for 1 min; critical success negates; critical failure effects last for 1 hr)
Dimensional Lock (D7 Abj): (2) R120' 60' burst attempts to counteract any teleportation or planar travel until next daily prep
Discern Lies (D4 Div): (2) Self gains +4 Perception vs. lies for 10 min
Discern Location (D8 Div): (10 min) Reveals the exact location of a specified familiar creature or object
Dispel Magic (D2 Abj): (2) R120' Makes a counteract check to remove 1 spell effect from the target or to make a magic item inert for 10 min
Disperse Into Air (D4 Foc Tra): (R) After taking the triggering damage, self becomes air with no actions and immunity to attacks until the end of the turn, then reforms anywhere within 15'
Disrupt Undead (DC1 Nec): (2) R30' Inflicts 1d6+3 HP positive on an undead target (save basic Fortitude; critical failure also inflicts enfeebled 1 for 1 rd) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Disrupting Weapons (D1 Nec): (2) Two touched weapons inflict +1d4 HP positive vs. undead for 1 min (heightened 3rd weapons inflict +2d4 HP; 5th three weapons inflict +3d4 HP)
Divine Aura (D8 Abj): (2) 10' emanation gives allies +1 Armor Class and saves, +2 vs. creatures opposed to a specified alignment, and +4 vs. opposed alignment control, and blinds melee attackers of opposed alignment (save Will negates), while sustained for up to 1 min; the first Sustain each rd increases the emanation radius by 10'
Divine Decree (D7 Evo): (2) R40' 40' emanation inflicts 7d10 HP specified alignment damage; creatures of opposed alignment also suffer enfeebled 2 for 1 min (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP, banishment, and, for creatures of level 10 and lower, paralysis for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts death); matching alignment negates; neutral alignment improves save by 1 degree) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP and increases the level of creatures that suffer paralysis by 2)
Divine Inspiration (D8 Enc): (2) Willing touched recovers 1 6th-level or lower spell or slot and regains Focus Points
Divine Lance (DC1 Evo): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts 1d4+3 HP of chosen alignment, or double HP on a critical success (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP)
Divine Vessel (D7 Tra): (2) Self becomes Large and gains 40 temporary HP, 25' fly Speed, +1 vs. spells, darkvision, and fist, bite, or claw attacks that inflict 2d8 HP, 2d10 HP, or 2d10 HP, inflicts +1 HP of chosen alignment, and suffers weakness 10 to the opposite alignment for 1 min (heightened 9th gives 60 temporary HP and weakness 15, lasting 10 min)
Divine Wrath (D4 Evo): (2) R120' 20' burst inflicts 4d10 HP of chosen alignment and sickened 1 (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts sickened 2 and slowed 1; matching alignment negates; neutral alignment improves save by 1 degree) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP)
Downpour (D4 Foc Evo): (2) R120' 30' burst extinguishes non-magical flames, gives concealment and fire resistance 10, and damages creatures with a water weakness for 1 min (heightened +1 gives +2 fire resistance)
Dream Message (D3 Enc): (10 min) Self sends 1 min of speech to a familiar creature, received the next time they sleep (heightened 4th sends speech to 10 familiar creatures)
Dreamer's Call (D4 Foc Enc): (2) R30' Target obeys a suggestion and suffers flat-footed and fascinated until the end of its next turn (save Will inflicts flat-footed and fascinated only; critical success negates; critical failure prevents the target from taking other actions)
Drop Dead (D5 Ill): (R) R120' Upon receiving the triggering wound, the target becomes invisible and is replaced by an illusionary corpse while sustained for up to 1 min; a hostile act by the target ends the spell (heightened 7th a hostile act does not end the spell)
Eclipse Burst (D7 Nec): (2) R500' 60' burst attempts to counteract magical light and inflicts 8d10 HP cold, plus 8d4 HP negative to living creatures (save Reflex; inflicts half HP; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and permanent blindness) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP cold and +1d4 HP negative)
Endure Elements (D2 Abj): (10 min) Protects touched from severe cold or heat until next daily prep (heightened 3rd protects from both cold and heat; 5th protects from extreme cold and heat)
Enduring Might (D4 Foc Abj): (R) Gives self resistance 12 to the triggering damage (heightened +1 gives +2 resistance)
Energy Aegis (D7 Abj): (1 min) Touched gains resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, negative, positive, and sonic damage for 1 day (heightened 9th gives resistance 10)
Enhance Victuals (D2 Tra): (1 min) Improves the quality of touched 1 gallon of water or 5 pounds of food for 1 hr and attempts to counteract any poison (heightened +1 affects +1 gallon or +5 pounds
Eradicate Undeath (D4 Foc Nec): (2) 30' cone inflicts 4d12 HP positive to undead (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d12 HP)
Ethereal Jaunt (D7 Con): (2) Moves self from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 9th R30' affects 5 additional willing creatures, and effects last for 10 min)
Face In The Crowd (D1 Foc Ill): (1) Self gains +2 Deception and Stealth to blend into a crowd and ignores difficult terrain from crowds for 1 min (heightened 3rd R10' affects 10 creatures)
Faerie Fire (D2 Evo): (2) R120' 10' burst makes concealed creatures visible and invisible creatures concealed for 5 min
Fear (D1 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts frightened 2 (save Will inflicts frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 3 and fleeing for 1 rd) (heightened 3rd affects 5 targets)
Field Of Life (D6 Nec): (2) R30' 20' burst restores 1d8 HP per rd to living and inflicts 1d8 HP positive per rd to undead while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 8th restores and inflicts 1d10 HP; 9th restores and inflicts 1d12 HP)
Finger Of Death (D7 Nec): (2) R30' Target suffers 70 HP negative, dying at 0 HP (save basic Fortitudeheightened +1 inflicts +10 HP)
Fire Ray (D1 Foc Evo): (2) R60' Spell attack inflicts 2d6 HP fire; critical success inflicts double HP and 1d4 HP persistent fire (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP initial and +1d4 HP persistent)
Flame Barrier (D4 Foc Abj): (R) R60' Target gains fire resistance 15 against the triggering fire damage (heightened +2 gives +5 resistance)
Flame Strike (D5 Evo): (2) R120' 10' radius inflicts 8d6 HP fire, ignoring half of any resistance (save basic Reflex; fire immunity improves save by 1 degree) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Forbidding Ward (DC1 Abj): (2) R30' Target gains +1 Armor Class and saves vs. a specified foe while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 6th gives +2 Armor Class and saves)
Forced Quiet (D1 Foc Abj): (2) R30' Target can speak only at a whisper, requiring others over 10' away to succeed on a DC 29 Perception to hear, for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure effects last for 10 min)
Foresight (D9 Div): (2) Touched gains +2 initiative and does not suffer flat-footed vs. undetected and flanking creatures, and self may use a reaction to give the target the better of two rolls or its foe the worse of two rolls, for 1 hr
Freedom Of Movement (D4 Abj): (2) Relieves touched of Speed penalty effects and gives automatic success on Escape attempts vs. non-magical effects and magical effects up to the spell level for 10 min
Gate (D10 Con): (2) R120' Opens a 40' radius gate to another plane while sustained for up to 1 min
Gentle Repose (D2 Nec): (2) Touched corpse does not decay and cannot be made undead until next daily prep (heightened 5th effects are permanent)
Ghoulish Cravings (D2 Nec): (2) Touched suffers stage 2 ghoul fever, which inflicts 3d8 HP negative and half normal healing; subsequent daily save failures will inflict an additional 3d8 HP at stage 3, 3d8 HP and no healing at stage 4 and stage 5, and death and transformation into a ghoul at stage 6 (save Fortitude inflicts stage 1 with no initial ill effects; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stage 3)
Glimpse The Truth (D4 Foc Div): (1) Successful counteract attempts in a 30' emanation allow self to see through illusions for 1 rd (heightened 7th allows others to see through illusions)
Globe Of Invulnerability (D4 Abj): (2) 10' burst attempts to counteract outside spells at the spell level - 1 for 10 min
Glyph Of Warding (D3 Abj): (10 min) Specified trigger on a target container or 10'x10' area triggers a chosen spell of lower level
Guidance (DC1 Div): (1) R30' Target gains +1 on an attack, Perception, save, or skill check within 1 rd once per target per hr
Harm (D1 Nec): (1) Touched (2 or 3 actions gives R30' or a 30' emanation) suffers 1d8 HP negative (save basic Fortitude); undead instead regain 1d8 HP, or 1d8+8 HP with 2 actions (heightened +1 restores or inflicts +1d8 HP; undead regain +8 HP with 2 actions)
Heal (D1 Nec): (1) Touched (2 or 3 actions gives R30' or a 30' emanation) regains 1d8 HP, or 1d8+8 HP with 2 actions; undead instead suffer 1d8 HP (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 restores or inflicts +1d8 HP; restores +8 HP with 2 actions)
Healer's Blessing (D1 Foc Nec): (1) R30' Healing spells affecting the target restore +2 HP for 1 min (heightened +1 restores +2 HP)
Hero's Defiance (D10 Foc Nec): (F) Self recovers 10d4+20 HP before suffering damage that would reduce HP to 0 once per Refocus
Heroism (D3 Enc): (2) Touched gains +1 attack, Perception, saves, and skill checks for 10 min (heightened 6th gives +2 bonus; 8th gives +3 bonus)
Holy Cascade (D4 Evo): (2) R500' 20' burst inflicts 3d6 HP bludgeoning, plus 6d6 HP positive to undead and 6d6 HP good to fiends (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP bludgeoning and +2d6 HP positive and good)
Hurtling Stone (D1 Foc Evo): (1) R60' Spell attack inflicts 1d6+4 HP bludgeoning, or double HP on a critical success (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Know Direction (DC1 Div): (2) Reveals which direction is north (heightened 7th reveals direction to a familiar location)
Know The Enemy (D4 Foc Div): (R) Allows a Recall Knowledge check, using the better of two rolls, during initiative or immediately after inflicting damage to remember a target's abilities
Lay On Hands (D1 Foc Nec): (1) Touched regains 6 HP and gains +2 Armor Class for 1 rd; touched undead instead suffers 1d6 HP and -2 Armor Class for 1 rd (save basic Fortitude also negates -2 Armor Class) (heightened +1 restores +6 HP or inflicts +1d6 HP)
Light (DC1 Evo): (2) Touched object lights a 20' radius until next daily prep (heightened 4th lights a 60' radius)
Litany Against Sloth (D5 Foc Evo): (1) R30' Evil target suffers reaction prevention and slowed 1 for 1 rd (save Will reaction prevention only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts slowed 2; slothful creatures worsen save by 1 degree)
Litany Against Wrath (D3 Foc Evo): (1) R30' Evil target suffers 3d6 HP good whenever it damages a good creature for 1 rd (save Will inflicts damage once; critical success negates; critical failure also inflicts enfeebled 2; wrathful creatures worsen save by 1 degree)
Litany Of Righteousness (D7 Foc Evo): (1) R30' Evil target suffers weakness 7 to good for 1 rd (heightened +1 inflicts weakness +1)
Localized Quake (D4 Foc Tra): (2) Choice of a 15' emanation or 15' cone inflicts 4d6 HP bludgeoning and knocked prone (save Reflex inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Locate (D3 Div): (10 min) R500' Reveals the direction to a named object or the nearest object of a named type while sustained; effects are blocked by lead and running water (heightened 5th reveals the direction to a familiar creature or ancestry)
Lock (D1 Abj): (2) Touched latch or lock opens only for self until next daily prep; a successful DC 29 Athletics or Thievery check (or lock DC + 4 if higher) ends the spell (heightened 2nd effects are permanent)
Lucky Break (D4 Foc Div): (R) Allows self to reroll a triggering failed save once per 10 min
Magic Weapon (D1 Tra): (2) Touched weapon gains +1 attack and 2 damage dice for 1 min
Magic's Vessel (D1 Foc Enc): (1) Touched gains +1 saves; subsequent casting sustains the spell up to 1 min and gives the target resistance to spell damage equal to the cast spell's level
Malignant Sustenance (D4 Foc Nec): (2) Touched undead gains fast healing 7 for 1 min (heightened +1 gives fast healing +2)
Massacre (D9 Nec): (2) 60' line inflicts 100 HP negative on creatures up to level 17 and kills those reduced to 0 HP; if none die, it inflicts an additional 30 negative on all within the line, including self (save Fortitude inflicts 9d6 HP; critical success negates; critical failure kills) (heightened 10th inflicts 115 HP (save Fortitude 10d6 HP) on creatures up to level 19)
Mending (D1 Tra): (10 min) Restores 5 HP per spell level to a touched light, non-magical object (heightened 2nd can affect a 1 Bulk object; 3rd can affect a 2 Bulk or magical 1 Bulk object)
Message (DC1 Ill): (1) R120' Allows self to hold a private conversation with a visible target for 1 turn (heightened 3rd R500')
Miracle (D10 Div): (3) Acts as Wish to reverse effects or produces effects similar to a known divine spell of up to 9th level or a common spell of up to 7th level
Moment Of Renewal (D8 Nec): (2) 6 touched instantly gain the effects of 24 hr of rest once per target per day
Moonbeam (D1 Foc Evo): (2) R120' Spell attack inflicts dazzled for 1 rd and 1d6 HP fire that counts as silver, or dazzled for 1 min and double HP on a critical success (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Mystic Beacon (D4 Foc Evo): (1) R30' Gives heightened +1 effects to the next damage or healing spell cast by the target within 1 rd
Nature's Bounty (D4 Foc Con): (1) Creates a fruit or vegetable that counts as a meal and restores 3d10+12 HP if eaten within 1 min (heightened +1 restores +6 HP)
Neutralize Poison (D3 Nec): (2) Makes a counteract check against 1 poison affecting touched
Outcast's Curse (D4 Enc): (2) Touched suffers one step worse initial attitudes and the worse of two Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, and Performance rolls until the curse is removed (save Will effects last for 10 min; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts initial attitudes two steps worse)
Overstuff (D1 Foc Tra): (2) R30' Target suffers sickened 1 and -10' Speed until no longer sickened (save Fortitude target may use an action to end the sickened condition; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts sickened 2)
Overwhelming Presence (D9 Enc): (2) 40' burst inflicts fascinated and forces creatures to pay tribute once per turn for six turns (save Will affected must pay tribute only twice; critical success negates; critical failure causes affected to use all actions each turn to pay tribute)
Perfected Form (D4 Foc Abj): (R) Allows self to reroll the triggering failed save vs. a morph, petrification, or polymorph effect
Perfected Mind (D1 Foc Abj): (1) Allows self an additional Will save vs. a mental effect once per effect
Plane Shift (D7 Con): (10 min) Transports self and 8 willing targets to an imprecise location on a different plane
Positive Luminance (D4 Foc Nec): (1) 10' light emanation inflicts 2 HP positive on successful undead attackers for 1 min; self may increase the radius by 10' and the damage by 2 HP each rd and may end the spell early to heal a living creature or damage an undead creature by double the current damage HP (heightened +1 inflicts +0.5 HP initially and for each increase)
Precious Metals (D4 Foc Tra): (1) Transforms touched metal item into cold iron, copper, gold, iron, silver, or steel for 1 min (heightened 8th can transform into adamantine or mithral)
Prestidigitation (DC1 Evo): (2) R10' Performs cooking, lifting, making a minor object, or tidying while sustained
Protection (D1 Abj): (2) Touched gains +1 Armor Class and saves vs. creatures of a specified alignment, and +3 vs. summoned creatures and control effects, for 1 min
Protector's Sacrifice (D1 Foc Abj): (R) R30' Transfers 3 HP damage of the triggering attack from target to self (heightened +1 transfers +3 HP)
Protector's Sphere (D4 Foc Abj): (2) 15' emanation gives resistance 3 to all damage to self and allies while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +1 gives +1 resistance)
Prying Eye (D5 Div): (1 min) R500' Creates an invisible sensor that allows self to see from the target location and that can be moved 30' each rd while sustained
Pulse Of The City (D4 Foc Div): (3) R25 miles; reveals information about the nearest settlement (heightened 5th increases the range to 100 miles)
Purify Food And Drink (D1 Nec): (2) Removes contaminates from 1 cubic foot of food or water
Pushing Gust (D1 Foc Con): (2) R500' Pushes target away 10' (save Fortitude pushes 5'; critical success negates; critical failure pushes 10' and knocks prone)
Raise Dead (D6 Nec): (10 min) R10' Restores a willing soul up to level 13 to its corpse, dead for at most 3 days, giving it 1 HP, clumsy 2, drained 2, and enfeebled 2 for 1 week (heightened 7th raises the maximum level to 15; 8th level 17; 9th level 19; 10th level 21)
Ray Of Enfeeblement (D1 Nec): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts enfeebled 2 for 1 min (save Fortitude inflicts enfeebled 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts enfeebled 3; critical success on attack worsens save by 1 degree)
Read Aura (DC1 Div): (1 min) R30' Reveals whether an object is magical and the related school of magic (heightened 3rd affects 10 targets; 6th affects unlimited targets)
Read Fate (D1 Foc Div): (1 min) R10' Successful DC 6 flat check gives a one-word clue to the target's short-term fate
Read Omens (D4 Div): (10 min) Reveals a clue or advice about a proposed activity up to 1 week in the future
Rebuke Death (D4 Foc Nec): (1) 1 target in a 20' emanation (2 or 3 actions affect 2 or 3 targets) regains 3d6 HP and recovers from the dying condition without increasing its wounded condition (heightened +1 restores +1d6 HP)
Regenerate (D7 Nec): (2) Touched target regains 15 HP and regrows a damaged organ each rd for 1 min; suffering new acid or fire damage negates the effects for 1 rd (heightened 9th restores 20 HP each rd)
Remake (D10 Con): (1 hr) R5' Fully re-creates a known object up to 5'x5'x5' from a remnant
Remove Curse (D4 Nec): (10 min) Makes a counteract attempt vs. 1 curse affecting touched
Remove Disease (D3 Nec): (10 min) Makes a counteract attempt vs. 1 disease affecting touched
Remove Fear (D2 Enc): (2) Makes a counteract attempt vs. 1 fear effect affecting touched (heightened 6th R30' affects 10 targets)
Remove Paralysis (D2 Nec): (2) Makes a counteract attempt vs. a paralysis effect affecting touched (heightened 6th R30' affects 10 targets)
Repulsion (D6 Abj): (2) Emanation up to 40' prevents creatures from approaching for 1 min (save Will inflicts difficult terrain; critical success negates)
Resist Energy (D2 Abj): (2) Touched gains resistance 5 vs. a specified energy type for 10 min (heightened 4th gives resistance 10 to 2 targets; 7th gives resistance 15 to 5 targets)
Restoration (D2 Nec): (1 min) Gives a 2-step reduction to a clumsy, enfeebled, or stupefied condition, a 1-step reduction to two of these conditions, or a 1-stage reduction to a toxin affecting touched (heightened 4th allows reducing a drained condition, lessening a toxin by 2 stages, or reducing a non-permanent doomed condition by 1; 6th allows reducing a permanent doomed condition by 1)
Restore Senses (D2 Nec): (2) Makes a counteract attempt vs. a magical blindness or deafness effect affecting touched (heightened 6th R30' affects 10 targets)
Retributive Pain (D4 Foc Abj): (R) R30' Inflicts half the triggering damage to self on the attacker as mental HP
Revival (D10 Nec): (2) 30' radius restores 10d8+40 HP to living targets and raises dead targets with the same number of temporary HP while sustained for up to 1 min
Righteous Might (D6 Tra): (2) Self gains Armor Class 32, 10 temporary HP, 40' Speed, resistance 3 to physical damage, darkvision, +21 attack and +8 damage (+6 if ranged) with a staff, and +23 Athletics for 1 min (heightened 8th gives a Large form with 10' reach, Armor Class 33, 15 temporary HP, resistance 4 to physical damage, +28 attack and +15 damage (+12 if ranged) with a staff, and +29 Athletics)
Safeguard Secret (D4 Foc Abj): (1 min) R10' Self and allies gain +4 skill checks to conceal a specified piece of knowledge for 1 hr
Sanctified Ground (D3 Abj): (1 min) 30' burst gives +1 Armor Class, attacks, damage, and saves vs. aberrations, celestials, dragons, fiends, monitors, or undead until next daily prep
Sanctuary (D1 Abj): (2) Prevents creatures from attacking touched for 1 min (save Will each rd negates for 1 rd; critical success ends the spell; critical failure allows no further save attempts)
Savor The Sting (D1 Foc Enc): (1) Touch inflicts 1d4 HP mental and 1d4 HP persistent mental and gives self +1 attack and skill checks vs. the target while persistent damage continues (save Will inflicts half initial HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double initial and persistent HP) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP initial and persistent)
Scholarly Recollection (D1 Foc Div): (R) Allows self to use the better of two rolls on the triggering Seek or Recall Knowledge check
Searing Light (D3 Evo): (2) R120' Spell attack inflicts 5d6 HP fire, plus 5d6 HP good to fiends and undead (critical success inflicts double HP), and attempts to counteract magical darkness (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP fire and good)
See Invisibility (D2 Div): (2) Self treats invisible creatures and objects as concealed for 10 min (heightened 5th effects last for 8 hr)
Sending (D5 Div): (3) Self exchanges a pair of 25-word messages with a known creature
Shadow Blast (D5 Evo): (2) 30' cone, R120' 15' burst, or 50' line inflicts 5d8 HP of a choice of damage type (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Shared Nightmare (D4 Foc Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts confused for 1 action each rd for 1 min (save Will inflicts confused on self for 1 action next turn; critical success inflicts confused on self for 1 rd; critical failure inflicts confused for 1 min)
Shield (DC1 Abj): (1) Self gains +1 Armor Class for 1 rd; may end the spell and not use it again for 10 min to use Shield Block with Hardness 5 (heightened 3rd gives Hardness 10; 5th gives Hardness 15; 7th gives Hardness 20; 9th gives Hardness 25)
Shield Other (D2 Nec): (2) R30' Transfers half of damage suffered by target to self for 10 min or until either is reduced to 0 HP
Sigil (DC1 Tra): (2) Inscribes a 1" sq magical mark on a touched object or creature; the mark can be scrubbed off and fades from a creature after 1 week (heightened 3rd marks a creature for 1 month; 5th marks a creature for 1 year; 7th marks a creature permanently)
Silence (D2 Ill): (2) Willing touched makes no sound for 1 min (heightened 4th affects a 10' radius around touched)
Soothing Words (D1 Foc Enc): (1) R30' Gives the target +1 Will and +2 vs. emotion effects for 1 rd and attempts to counteract an existing emotion effect (heightened 5th gives +2 Will and +3 vs. emotion effects)
Sound Burst (D2 Evo): (2) R30' 10' burst inflicts 2d10 HP sonic and deafened for 1 rd (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP, deafened for 1 min, and stunned 1) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP)
Spell Immunity (D4 Abj): (2) Gives touched an automatic counteract attempt vs. a specified spell until next daily prep
Spellwrack (D6 Abj): (2) R30' Until the curse is removed, each time the target is affected by a spell with a duration, it suffers 2d12 HP persistent force and the duration of every spell affecting it is reduced by 1 rd (save Will effects last for 1 min; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts 4d12 HP)
Spirit Blast (D6 Nec): (2) R30' Target's spirit suffers 16d6 HP force (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Spirit Link (D1 Nec): (2) R30' Transfers 2 HP of damage each rd from a willing target to self for 10 min (heightened +1 transfers +2 HP)
Spiritual Epidemic (D8 Nec): (2) R120' Inflicts enfeebled 2 and stupefied 2 for 1 min and enfeebled 1 and stupefied 1 permanently; also affects creatures who later cast divine or occult spells on the target (save Will inflicts enfeebled 2 and stupefied 2 for 1 rd only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts enfeebled 3 and stupefied 3 for 1 min and enfeebled 2 and stupefied 2 permanently)
Spiritual Guardian (D5 Abj): (2) R120' Summoned guardian with 50 HP may attack or defend each rd while sustained for up to 1 min; +19 attack inflicts 2d8 HP force or weapon damage type; defense absorbs 10 HP of damage from an attack on an ally (heightened +2 guardian gains +20 HP and inflicts +1d8 HP)
Spiritual Weapon (D2 Evo): (2) R120' Spectral weapon makes a +19 attack that inflicts 1d8 HP force or weapon damage type each rd while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +2 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Splash Of Art (D1 Foc Ill): (2) R30' 5' burst randomly inflicts one of dazzled for 1 rd, enfeebled 1 for 1 rd, frightened 1, or clumsy 1 for 1 rd (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts dazzled for 1 min, enfeebled 2 for 1 rd, frightened 2, or clumsy 2 for 1 rd)
Stabilize (DC1 Nec): (2) R30' Removes dying condition from target
Status (D2 Div): (2) Reveals willing touched's direction, distance, and conditions until next daily prep (heightened 4th R10' affects 10 targets)
Stone Tell (D6 Evo): (2) Allows self to converse with stone for 10 min
Stone To Flesh (D6 Tra): (2) Restores touched petrified creature or transforms a human-sized stone object into flesh
Sudden Shift (D1 Foc Abj): (R) Self Steps and becomes concealed until the end of the next turn after the triggering foe melee attack miss
Summon Celestial (D5 Con): (3) R30' A level 5 celestial appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +1 summons a +2 level creature)
Summon Fiend (D5 Con): (3) R30' A level 5 fiend appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +1 summons a +2 level creature)
Sunburst (D7 Evo): (2) R500' 60' burst attempts to counteract magical darkness and inflicts 8d10 HP fire, plus 8d10 HP positive to undead (save Reflex inflicts half HP; critical success negates; critical failure also inflicts permanent blindness) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP fire and positive)
Sweet Dream (D1 Foc Enc): (3) R30' Willing target who sleeps for 1 min gains +1 intelligence-based skill checks, +1 charisma-based skill checks, or +5' Speed for 9 min
Take Its Course (D4 Foc Nec): (2) Touched gains an immediate save with a +2 or -2 modifier vs. an affliction, or an immediate DC 5 or 20 flat check against persistent poison damage (save Will negates) (heightened 7th affects multiple afflictions and poisons affecting the target)
Talking Corpse (D4 Nec): (10 min) Touched corpse truthfully answers 3 questions within 10 min (save Will allows lying or refusing to answer; critical success prevents self from resting for 24 hr; critical failure inflicts -2 on Deception checks when giving misleading answers)
Telepathic Demand (D9 Enc): (3) Self exchanges a pair of 25-word messages with an existing telepathic target, sending a Suggestion as part of the message (save Will gives immunity for 1 day; critical success gives immunity for 1 month)
Tempt Fate (D4 Foc Div): (R) R120' Gives the target +1 on the triggering save and turns a normal success into a critical success or a normal failure into a critical failure (heightened 8th gives +2 on the save)
Tidal Surge (D1 Foc Evo): (1) R60' Moves the target 5' over ground or 10' in water (save Fortitude negates; critical failure doubles distance)
Tongues (D5 Div): (2) Target understands and speaks all languages for 1 hr (heightened 7th effects last for 8 hr)
Touch Of Obedience (D1 Foc Enc): (1) Touch inflicts stupefied 1 until the end of the next turn (save Will inflicts stupefied 1 until the end of the current turn; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stupefied 1 for 1 min)
Touch Of The Moon (D4 Foc Enc): (1) Target emits dim light in a 20' radius and cycles through benefits each rd for 1 min: no benefit; +1 attack and +4 damage; +1 attack, +4 damage, +1 Armor Class, and +1 saves; +1 Armor Class and +1 saves
Touch Of Undeath (D1 Foc Nec): (1) Touch inflicts 1d6 HP negative and half healing for 1 rd (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical success inflicts double HP and half healing for 1 min) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Traveler's Transit (D4 Foc Evo): (2) Self gains a 25' climb Speed or a 25' swim Speed for 1 min (heightened 5th allows choosing a 25' fly Speed)
Trickster's Twin (D4 Foc Ill): (2) R30' Target believes that self is in a location up to 100' distant for 1 min or until succeeding at a Will save in response to interacting with the illusion or to the illusion performing a nonsensical or hostile action (save Will no subsequent Will save is necessary; critical success negates; critical failure requires critical success on a Will save to end the spell)
True Seeing (D6 Div): (2) R60' Makes counteract checks to allow self to see through illusions and transmutations for 10 min
Undetectable Alignment (D2 Abj): (1 min) Touched appears neutral to alignment detection until next daily prep
Unimpeded Stride (D1 Foc Tra): (1) Frees self from magical holds of a level less than or equal to the spell level and allows a Stride that ignores difficult terrain and Speed penalties
Unity (D4 Foc Abj): (R) R30' Allows allies to use self's saving throw vs. the triggering spell or ability
Vampiric Exsanguination (D6 Nec): (2) 30' cone inflicts 12d6 HP negative, giving self temporary HP for 1 min equal to half that suffered by the most-affected target (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Vampiric Touch (D3 Nec): (2) Touch inflicts 6d6 HP negative, giving self temporary HP for 1 min equal to half the inflicted damage (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Veil Of Confidence (D1 Foc Enc): (1) Reduces any frightened condition on self by 1 for 1 min; critical failure on a subsequent save ends the spell and increases the frightened condition by 1
Ventriloquism (D1 Ill): (2) Allows self to project their voice up to 60' for 10 min (heightened 2nd effects last for 1 hr, allow changing voice quality, and require an active Perception to attempt to disbelieve)
Vibrant Thorns (D1 Foc Tra): (1) Unarmed and adjacent melee attacks on self inflict 1 HP piercing on the attacker for 1 min; casting a positive spell increases the damage to 1d6 HP for 1 turn (heightened +1 inflicts +1 HP, or +1d6 HP after casting a positive spell)
Vital Beacon (D4 Nec): (1 min) Touch heals once each rd: 4d10 HP, 4d8 HP, 4d6 HP, then 4d4 HP, until expended or next daily prep (heightened +1 each touch restores +1 die)
Wail Of The Banshee (D9 Nec): (2) 40' emanation inflicts 8d10 HP negative and drained 1d4 (save Fortitude inflicts HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and drained 4)
Waking Nightmare (D1 Foc Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts frightened 2 (save Will inflicts frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 3; failure while sleeping also inflicts fleeing for 1 rd)
Wanderer's Guide (D3 Div): (1 min) Reveals a route to a specified destination and reduces the movement penalty from difficult terrain while following it by half until next daily prep
Water Breathing (D2 Tra): (1 min) R30' 5 targets can breathe water for 1 hr (heightened 3rd effects last for 8 hr; 4th effects last until next daily prep)
Water Walk (D2 Tra): (2) Touched can walk on liquids for 10 min (heightened 4th R30' affects 10 creatures, and effects last for 1 hr)
Weapon Of Judgment (D9 Evo): (2) R100' +19 attacks by a force weapon inflict 3d10+3 HP force or weapon damage type for 1 min (heightened 10th inflicts +1d10 HP)
Weapon Surge (D1 Foc Evo): (1) Held weapon gains +1 attack and an additional die of damage on the next attack before the start of the next turn
Word Of Freedom (D4 Foc Enc): (1) R30' Suppresses a confused, frightened, grabbed, paralyzed, or restrained condition affecting the target for 1 rd
Word Of Truth (D1 Foc Div): (1) Causes a glowing symbol of Nethys to appear when self speaks true statements of up to 25 words while sustained for up to 1 min
Zeal For Battle (D4 Foc Enc): (R) R10' Allows self and an ally to each use the higher of their initiative rolls
Zealous Conviction (D6 Enc): (2) R30' 10 willing targets gain 12 temporary HP, gain +2 Will vs. mental effects, and must comply with self requests for 10 min (save Will after fulfilling a repugnant request ends the spell) (heightened 9th gives 18 temporary HP and +3 Will)
Zone Of Truth (D3 Enc): (2) R30' 20' burst prevents lies and inflicts -2 Deception for 10 min (save Will inflicts -2 Deception only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts -4 Deception)
Magic Notes:
Warpriest: Spell Expert (Divine)
Cantrip Expansion: Can prepare two additional cantrips each day or add two additional cantrips to repertoire
Deity: Has access to Magic Missile, Magic Mouth, Levitate, Blink, Prying Eye, Wall Of Force, Warp Mind, Maze, and Destruction spells
Divine Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the divine tradition
Divine Weapon: (F) Using a divine spell slot causes a wielded weapon to inflict +1d4 HP force or +1d6 HP alignment for the remainder of the turn once per turn
Harmful Font: Can cast Harm at level 6 an additional 4 times per day
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Sap Life: Casting Harm on another creature restores HP to self equal to the spell level
Steady Spellcasting: Successful DC 15 flat check negates spellcasting disruption
